marketingInfo.description:
With the sensitivity around application code, development machines connected to Enterprise TFS servers are the most protected instances. Such development servers need to be properly secured when being deployed. Server hardening process provides a solid edifice to build and deploy secure apps. These Instances are hardened based on Microsoft security baseline recommendations, Industry best practices and CIS hardening checklists.

Enterprises planning to deploy Visual Studio Professional 2015 for production on GCP can use this specially hardened image of Visual Studio Professional 2015 on Windows Server 2016 and save on large development time and effort.Please reach out to our enterprise support team for any deployment issues.

Visual Studio Professional 2015 is an end-to-end solution for building and managing complex applications.

Visual Studio 2015 contains many new and exciting features and IDE productivity enhancements to support Windows app development, cross-platform mobile development, web and cloud development, and more. It is used to develop computer programs for Microsoft Windows, as well as websites, web apps, web services and mobile apps. Visual Studio supports different programming languages and allows the code editor and debugger to support nearly any programming language, provided a language-specific service exists.
